products.title: Amor Pacific Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Amor Navy Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: Warm, luxurious and just oozing personality, the deep blue of the amor navy blue blocks out the harsh direct sunlight and is fully blackout, meaning no light will pass through this fabric. Made from 100% polyester, this fabric is perfect for classing up damp environments, such as bathrooms or the titanic ballroom. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Damson Vertical Blind
products.description: Warm and rich with fruity overtones, the amor damson is an elegant, blackout, solution to the problem of boring rooms that are far too bright. It mellows existing colours while adding its own flair to the environment. Suitable for those spaces that need to be kept low energy, and where you need to sleep - such as bedrooms, helping you get a good nights rest whilst still giving your room an exciting window covering.

products.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Vertical
products.description: The pale, lilac mist colour is best used in a room where you want the blind to blend in with the rest of the room. Use this with similar pastel tones. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. products.title: Gibson Powder Grey Vertical
products.description: The lighter grey tone in the gibson powder grey is perfect for use in bathrooms or bedrooms. The vertical slats tilt so you have total control over the light entering your room. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Lime Vertical Blind
products.description: The kerry lime is a strong, bold green colour that is one that won't go unnoticed in your window. Pair in with a neon theme to really make this blind pop. There isn't much else we can say about this colour other than how vibrant and green it is, it is a blackout fabric so would also work in a bedroom and prevent any light from passing through the fabric itself. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Stoney Rock Vertical Blind
products.description: The lighter grey colour of the kerry stoney rock is perfect for adding into a more neutral and toned down decor. This blind is great for pairing against lighter grey decors and for blending into the background. This blind is also perfect for bedrooms as the blackout fabric will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Charcoal Vertical Blind
products.description: The dark grey of the kerry charcoal is perfect for adding as darker and mysterious tone to your windows, or pairing in with a darker grey feature wall in your home. This is a blackout fabric so will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Use this in your bedroom if you're woken by the early morning sun or bright streetlamps outside your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Dark Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: The kerry dark grey is probably the colour that would come to mind when someone says the words 'dark grey' to you. With this in mind, we do offer free samples of all their fabrics, but equally, if you're looking for a dark grey blind - this is probably it. Being blackout means this is perfect for your bedroom too as it will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Lemon Vertical Blind

products.title: Kerry Midnight Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: The kerry midnight blue vertical blind is a rich, deep blue colour - slightly darker than navy blue, but is a very smart and stylish colour. Use this alongside similar darker blue tones in your home and use this blind to complement similar navy blue tones in your home. Being a blackout fabric means that this blind is perfect for your bedroom as the fabric will stop all of the light from passing through it.

products.title: Kerry Light Hessian Vertical Blind
products.description: The lighter beige colour of the kerry light hessian is perfect for installing in a neutral toned room, use this blind alongside similarly toned decors and let the blind shade your room from the sun, whilst also sitting back and taking it easy in your window. Also being a blackout fabric this blind is perfect for bedrooms as it will block all of the light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Emerald Vertical Blind
products.description: The emerald green kerry fabric is a tealy-green fabric that is somewhere between tropical green, teal and emerald- this is a fabric to see as it's unique colouring. This is also a blackout fabric which makes it ideal for bedrooms as it'll block out all of the light passing through the blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Blush Blue Vertical Blind
products.description: The light blush blue of this vertical blind is perfect for adding a lighter, bright colour to your windows. Pairing in beautifully with soft pastel or neutral tones, this fabric is also blackout so will stop all light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.
